content:
Hi,

I am new to zulip, I have configured that on our organization's server. its a good application to use with lots of integration options.
Is there any option available to get the chat history of user for direct messages as well as for group messages?

If its available what are the possible ways to use that and what are the settings I need to do on the server. it would be good if one can suggest /provide any document/url.

Thanks
What do you mean by get the chat history? If you click on their name in the right sidebar and scroll up, it should be there
Being Admin of application if I want to get all chat history of any user within the organization, can I get that ?
Like with whom that user has chat, what they have discussed on chat?

What do you mean by get the chat history? If you click on their name in the right sidebar and scroll up, it should be there

If I use the steps as mentioned I can only see the messages which has been sent by you as we had some conversation but what if I haven't done any coversation with any one and I want chat history of that user?

Admins are not allowed to see the messages of other users, under normal circumstances. This gives the users a reasonable amount of privacy while using . But, of course, the admins can access the DB and get content out of it, if they really want to.

Are you talking about looking at the chat history of users on Zulip Cloud or on a self-hosted server? For organisations hosted on the Zulip Cloud, an export can be asked for.
can you provide me the url or document or can you tell me from where I can found that from DB?
You could look at how the export tools work, I guess.
I have tried export but its not creating any file as mentioned in the doc
is there any other way or alternate available?
its done it has created I dont know how but earlier when I have tried it was not creating file but after trying for some times it worked
